participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and introverted, Liam prefers the simplicity of life over trends.
participant_1.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Innovative and reserved, Avery thrives in solitude and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i am a recluse. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i am a famous twitch streamer.
